heading: HB08466
0: AN ACT DECLARING AS UNLAWFUL THE REPRODUCTION OF COPYRIGHTED BOOKS AND PRINTED MATERIALS THROUGH PHOTOCOPYING, DUPLICATING, PRINTING MACHINES OR SIMILAR MEANS WITHOUT THE CONSENT OF THE COPYRIGHT OWNER, WHETHER THE PUBLISHER OR THE AUTHOR OR BOTH
status: Pending with the Committee on JUSTICE since 2018-11-12
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB08466
FULL TITLE : AN ACT DECLARING AS UNLAWFUL THE REPRODUCTION OF COPYRIGHTED BOOKS AND PRINTED MATERIALS THROUGH PHOTOCOPYING, DUPLICATING, PRINTING MACHINES OR SIMILAR MEANS WITHOUT THE CONSENT OF THE COPYRIGHT OWNER, WHETHER THE PUBLISHER OR THE AUTHOR OR BOTH
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2018-10-11
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON JUSTICE ON 2018-11-12
